  echo: false

- Number figures according to the order in which they are first mentioned in the main text.
- Clearly label all axes, giving both the measure and the unit of measurement.
- Not larger than 7.5 inches in width.
- Save and submit each main text figure as an individual file (PDF with fonts embedded). Include the figure number in the file name of each figure.
- Provide main text figure captions on a new page of the main text after the tables.
- Include a title for the entire figure and descriptors for each panel.

# CTD Results

#| label: fig-ctd-res
